metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Machine Learning Languages
Programming languages involved in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence are:
content.html: Programming languages involved in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence are:

content.text: LISP
LISP is the second oldest programming language in the world (1958), one year younger than Fortran (1957).
content.html: LISP is the second oldest programming language in the world (1958), one year younger than Fortran (1957).

content.text: The term Artificial Intelligence was made up by John McCarthy who invented LISP.
content.html: The term Artificial Intelligence was made up by John McCarthy who invented LISP.

content.text: LISP was founded on the theory of Recursive Functions (self modifying functions), and this is very suitable for Machine Learning programs where "self-learning" is an important part of the program.
content.html: LISP was founded on the theory of Recursive Functions (self modifying functions), and this is very suitable for Machine Learning programs where "self-learning" is an important part of the program.

content.text: The R Language
R is a programming language for Graphics and Statistical computing.
content.html: R is a programming language for Graphics and Statistical computing.

content.text: R is supported by the R Foundation for Statistical Computing .
content.html: R is supported by the R Foundation for Statistical Computing.

content.text: R comes with a wide set of statistical and graphical techniques for:
content.html: R comes with a wide set of statistical and graphical techniques for:

content.text: Python
Python is a general-purpose coding language. It can be used for all types of programming and software development.
content.html: Python is a general-purpose coding language. It can be used for all types of programming and software development.

content.text: Python is typically used for server development, like building web apps for web servers.
content.html: Python is typically used for server development, like building web apps for web servers.

content.text: Python is also typically used in Data Science .
content.html: Python is also typically used in Data Science.

content.text: An advantage for using Python is that it comes with some very suitable libraries:
content.html: An advantage for using Python is that it comes with some very suitable libraries:

content.text: Source: Octoverse
content.html: Source: Octoverse

content.text: C++ holds the title: " The worlds fastest programming language ".
content.html: C++ holds the title: "The worlds fastest programming language".

content.text: Because of the speed, C++ is a preferred language when programming Computer Games.
content.html: Because of the speed, C++ is a preferred language when programming Computer Games.

content.text: It provides faster execution and has less response time which is applied in search engines and development of computer games.
content.html: It provides faster execution and has less response time which is applied in search engines and development of computer games.

content.text: Google uses C++ in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning programs for SEO (Search Engine Optimization).
content.html: Google uses C++ in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning programs for SEO (Search Engine Optimization).

content.text: SHARK is a super-fast C++ library with support for supervised learning algorithms, linear regression, neural networks, and clustering.
content.html: SHARK is a super-fast C++ library with support for supervised learning algorithms, linear regression, neural networks, and clustering.

content.text: MLPACK is also a super-fast machine learning library for C++.
content.html: MLPACK is also a super-fast machine learning library for C++.

content.text: Java
Java is another general-purpose coding language that can be used for all types of software development.
content.html: Java is another general-purpose coding language that can be used for all types of software development.

content.text: For Machine Learning, Java is mostly used to create algorithms, and neural networks.
content.html: For Machine Learning, Java is mostly used to create algorithms, and neural networks.

content.text: SQL
SQL (Structured Query Language) is the most popular language for managing data.
content.html: SQL (Structured Query Language) is the most popular language for managing data.

content.text: Knowledge of SQL databases, tables and queries helps data scientists when dealing with data.
content.html: Knowledge of SQL databases, tables and queries helps data scientists when dealing with data.

content.text: SQL is very convenient for storing, manipulating, and retrieving data in databases.
content.html: SQL is very convenient for storing, manipulating, and retrieving data in databases.
